author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Schizophrenia Research Foundation is holding a ‘Mental Health Café’, an informal conversation about mental health in the media and movies, on Sunday.

Film director Karu Palaniappan, R. Venkatesh, executive editor Kalki magazine, and Jaya Shreedhar, adjunct faculty, Asian College of Journalism, will participate in the talk. The Mental Health Café will be held at ETC Café, No. 7/4, Rutland Gate, 5{+t}{+h}Street, Nungambakkam between 5 p.m. and 6.30 p.m.

The event is open to all.
title: ‘Mental Health Café’ to be held today
